verses.verse: וַיַּֽעֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> stood up שָׂטָ֖ן <WH7854> And Satan עַל־ <WH5921> against יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> against Israel וַיָּ֙סֶת֙ <WH5496> and provoked אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> David לִמְנ֖וֹת <WH4487> to number אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֤יד <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹאָב֙ <WH3097> to Joab וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> and to the rulers הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people לְכ֗וּ <WH1980> Go סִפְרוּ֙ <WH5608> number אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel מִבְּאֵ֥ר שֶׁ֖בַע <WH884> from Beersheba וְעַד־ <WH5704> even דָּ֑ן <WH1835> even to Dan וְהָבִ֣יאוּ <WH935> and bring אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about וְאֵדְעָ֖ה <WH3045> of them to me that I may know אֶת־ <WH853> מִסְפָּרָֽם׃ <WH4557> the number

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> answered יוֹאָ֗ב <WH3097> And Joab יוֹסֵף֩ <WH3254> so many more יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> The LORD עַל־ <WH5921> unto עַמּ֤וֹ ׀ <WH5971> make his people כָּהֵם֙ <WH1992> as they מֵאָ֣ה <WH3967> an hundred פְעָמִ֔ים <WH6471> times הֲלֹא֙ <WH3808> are But אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> [be] but my lord הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king כֻּלָּ֥ם <WH3605> all לַאדֹנִ֖י <WH113> [are] they not all my lord's לַעֲבָדִ֑ים <WH5650> bondage לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> how long יְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <WH1245> require זֹאת֙ <WH2063> does אֲדֹנִ֔י <WH113> my lord לָ֛מָּה <WH4100> how long יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לְאַשְׁמָ֖ה <WH819> this thing? why will he be a cause of trespass לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וּדְבַר־ <WH1697> word הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> Nevertheless the king's חָזַ֣ק <WH2388> prevailed עַל־ <WH5921> against יוֹאָ֑ב <WH3097> against Joab וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> departed יוֹאָ֗ב <WH3097> Wherefore Joab וַיִּתְהַלֵּךְ֙ <WH1980> and went בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> throughout all Israel וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> and came יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> to Jerusalem

וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> gave יוֹאָ֛ב <WH3097> And Joab אֶת־ <WH853> מִסְפַּ֥ר <WH4557> the sum מִפְקַד־ <WH4662> of the number הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> of the people אֶל־ <WH413> unto דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> unto David וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become כָֽל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <WH3478> And all [they of] Israel אֶ֣לֶף <WH505> were a thousand אֲלָפִים֩ <WH505> thousand וּמֵאָ֨ה <WH3967> and an hundred אֶ֤לֶף <WH505> thousand אִישׁ֙ <WH376> men שֹׁ֣לֵֽף <WH8025> that drew חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> sword וִֽיהוּדָ֕ה <WH3063> and Judah אַרְבַּע֩ <WH702> [was] four מֵא֨וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְשִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> threescore and ten אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> thousand אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> men שֹׁ֥לֵֽף <WH8025> that drew חָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> sword

וְלֵוִי֙ <WH3878> But Levi וּבִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> and Benjamin לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not פָקַ֖ד <WH6485> counted בְּתוֹכָ֑ם <WH8432> he not among כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נִתְעַ֥ב <WH8581> was abominable דְּבַר־ <WH1697> word הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> them for the king's אֶת־ <WH854> for יוֹאָֽב׃ <WH3097> to Joab

וַיֵּ֙רַע֙ <WH7489> afflict בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> affliction הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> And God עַל־ <WH5921> and הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> with this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וַיַּ֖ךְ <WH5221> therefore he smote אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> unto God חָטָ֣אתִֽי <WH2398> I have sinned מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> greatly אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> I עָשִׂ֖יתִי <WH6213> because I have done אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now הַֽעֲבֶר־ <WH5674> but now I beseech thee do away נָא֙ <WH4994> please אֶת־ <WH853> עֲו֣וֹן <WH5771> the iniquity עַבְדְּךָ֔ <WH5650> of thy servant כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נִסְכַּ֖לְתִּי <WH5528> foolishly מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> for I have done very פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to גָּ֔ד <WH1410> unto Gad חֹזֵ֥ה <WH2374> seer דָוִ֖יד <WH1732> David's לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

לֵךְ֩ <WH1980> Go וְדִבַּרְתָּ֨ <WH1696> and tell אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֜יד <WH1732> David לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD שָׁל֕וֹשׁ <WH7969> thee three אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I נֹטֶ֣ה <WH5186> I offer עָלֶ֑יךָ <WH5921> and בְּחַר־ <WH977> [things] choose לְךָ֛ אַחַ֥ת <WH259> thee one מֵהֵ֖נָּה <WH2007> of them וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> that I may do לָּֽךְ׃

וַיָּ֥בֹא <WH935> came גָ֖ד <WH1410> So Gad אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> to David וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> and said ל֛וֹ כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֥ר <WH559> unto him Thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD קַבֶּל־ <WH6901> Choose לָֽךְ׃

אִם־ <WH518> [thee] or שָׁל֨וֹשׁ <WH7969> Either three שָׁנִ֜ים <WH8141> years' רָעָ֗ב <WH7458> famine וְאִם־ <WH518> either שְׁלֹשָׁ֨ה <WH7969> or three חֳדָשִׁ֜ים <WH2320> months נִסְפֶּ֥ה <WH5595> to be destroyed מִפְּנֵי־ <WH6440> before צָרֶיךָ֮ <WH6862> thy foes וְחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> while that the sword אוֹיְבֶ֣ךָ ׀ <WH341> of thine enemies לְמַשֶּׂגֶת֒ <WH5381> overtaketh וְאִם־ <WH518> either שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> else three יָ֠מִים <WH3117> days חֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> the sword יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְדֶ֙בֶר֙ <WH1698> even the pestilence בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in the land וּמַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> and the angel יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD מַשְׁחִ֖ית <WH7843> destroying בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> throughout all the coasts יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> therefore רְאֵ֔ה <WH7200> Now therefore advise מָֽה־ <WH4100> what אָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> I shall bring again אֶת־ <WH854> for שֹׁלְחִ֖י <WH7971> to him that sent דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> thyself what word פ

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֛יד <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to גָּ֖ד <WH1410> unto Gad צַר־ <WH6862> adversary לִ֣י מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> I am in a great אֶפְּלָה־ <WH5307> let me fall נָּ֣א <WH4994> please בְיַד־ <WH3027> now into the hand יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for רַבִּ֤ים <WH7227> great רַחֲמָיו֙ <WH7356> [are] his mercies מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> for very וּבְיַד־ <WH3027> into the hand אָדָ֖ם <WH120> of man אַל־ <WH408> not אֶפֹּֽל׃ <WH5307> but let me not fall

וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> sent יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> So the LORD דֶּ֖בֶר <WH1698> pestilence בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> upon Israel וַיִּפֹּל֙ <WH5307> and there fell מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> seventy אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> men

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <WH7971> sent הָאֱלֹהִ֨ים ׀ <WH430> And God מַלְאָ֥ךְ ׀ <WH4397> an angel לִֽירוּשָׁלִַם֮ <WH3389> unto Jerusalem לְהַשְׁחִיתָהּ֒ <WH7843> to destroy וּכְהַשְׁחִ֗ית <WH7843> it and as he was destroying רָאָ֤ה <WH7200> beheld יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD וַיִּנָּ֣חֶם <WH5162> and he repented עַל־ <WH5921> over הָֽרָעָ֔ה <WH7451> him of the evil וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> and said לַמַּלְאָ֤ךְ <WH4397> to the angel הַמַּשְׁחִית֙ <WH7843> that destroyed רַ֔ב <WH7227> It is enough עַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> now הֶ֣רֶף <WH7503> stay יָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> now thine hand וּמַלְאַ֤ךְ <WH4397> And the angel יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD עֹמֵ֔ד <WH5975> stood עִם־ <WH5973> by גֹּ֖רֶן <WH1637> by the threshingfloor אָרְנָ֥ן <WH771> of Ornan הַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <WH2983> the Jebusite ס

וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> lifted up דָוִ֜יד <WH1732> And David אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינָ֗יו <WH5869> his eyes וַיַּ֞רְא <WH7200> and saw אֶת־ <WH853> מַלְאַ֤ךְ <WH4397> the angel יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD עֹמֵ֗ד <WH5975> stand בֵּ֤ין <WH996> between הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> between the earth וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> between הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> and the heaven וְחַרְבּ֤וֹ <WH2719> sword שְׁלוּפָה֙ <WH8025> having a drawn בְּיָד֔וֹ <WH3027> in his hand נְטוּיָ֖ה <WH5186> stretched out עַל־ <WH5921> over יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> over Jerusalem וַיִּפֹּ֨ל <WH5307> fell דָּוִ֧יד <WH1732> Then David וְהַזְּקֵנִ֛ים <WH2205> and the elders מְכֻסִּ֥ים <WH3680> [of Israel who were] clothed בַּשַּׂקִּ֖ים <WH8242> in sackcloth עַל־ <WH5921> over פְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> upon their faces

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> And David אֶֽל־ <WH413> to הָאֱלֹהִ֡ים <WH430> unto God הֲלֹא֩ <WH3808> not אֲנִ֨י <WH589> I אָמַ֜רְתִּי <WH559> [Is it] not I [that] commanded לִמְנ֣וֹת <WH4487> to be numbered בָּעָ֗ם <WH5971> the people וַאֲנִי־ <WH589> I ה֤וּא <WH1931> he אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after חָטָ֙אתִי֙ <WH2398> ? even I it is that have sinned וְהָרֵ֣עַ <WH7489> and done evil הֲרֵע֔וֹתִי <WH7489> indeed וְאֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> these הַצֹּ֖אן <WH6629> but [as for] these sheep מֶ֣ה <WH4100> what עָשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> what have they done יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> I pray thee O LORD אֱלֹהַ֗י <WH430> my God תְּהִ֨י <WH1961> become נָ֤א <WH4994> please יָֽדְךָ֙ <WH3027> ? let thine hand בִּ֚י וּבְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> house אָבִ֔י <WH1> be on me and on my father's וּֽבְעַמְּךָ֖ <WH5971> but not on thy people לֹ֥א <WH3808> not לְמַגֵּפָֽה׃ <WH4046> that they should be plagued ס

וּמַלְאַ֧ךְ <WH4397> Then the angel יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD אָמַ֥ר <WH559> commanded אֶל־ <WH413> about גָּ֖ד <WH1410> Gad לֵאמֹ֣ר <WH559> to say לְדָוִ֑יד <WH1732> to David כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> should יַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> should go up דָוִ֗יד <WH1732> that David לְהָקִ֤ים <WH6965> and set up מִזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> an altar לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD בְּגֹ֖רֶן <WH1637> in the threshingfloor אָרְנָ֥ן <WH771> of Ornan הַיְבֻסִֽי׃ <WH2983> the Jebusite

וַיַּ֤עַל <WH5927> went up דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> And David בִּדְבַר־ <WH1697> at the saying גָּ֔ד <WH1410> of Gad אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> which he spake בְּשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> in the name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיָּ֣שָׁב <WH7725> turned back אָרְנָ֗ן <WH771> And Ornan וַיַּרְא֙ <WH7200> and saw אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּלְאָ֔ךְ <WH4397> the angel וְאַרְבַּ֧עַת <WH702> and his four בָּנָ֛יו <WH1121> sons עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with מִֽתְחַבְּאִ֑ים <WH2244> with him hid וְאָרְנָ֖ן <WH771> themselves Now Ornan דָּ֥שׁ <WH1758> was threshing חִטִּֽים׃ <WH2406> wheat

וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> came דָוִ֖יד <WH1732> And as David עַד־ <WH5704> against אָרְנָ֑ן <WH771> to Ornan וַיַּבֵּ֤ט <WH5027> looked אָרְנָן֙ <WH771> Ornan וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> and saw אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> David וַיֵּצֵא֙ <WH3318> and went out מִן־ <WH4480> from הַגֹּ֔רֶן <WH1637> of the threshingfloor וַיִּשְׁתַּ֧חוּ <WH7812> and bowed לְדָוִ֛יד <WH1732> himself to David אַפַּ֖יִם <WH639> with [his] face אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> to the ground

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֜יד <WH1732> Then David אֶל־ <WH413> to אָרְנָ֗ן <WH771> to Ornan תְּנָה־ <WH5414> Grant לִּי֙ מְק֣וֹם <WH4725> me the place הַגֹּ֔רֶן <WH1637> of [this] threshingfloor וְאֶבְנֶה־ <WH1129> that I may build בּ֥וֹ מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> an altar לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> therein unto the LORD בְּכֶ֤סֶף <WH3701> price מָלֵא֙ <WH4392> it me for the full תְּנֵ֣הוּ <WH5414> thou shalt grant לִ֔י וְתֵעָצַ֥ר <WH6113> may be stayed הַמַּגֵּפָ֖ה <WH4046> that the plague מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> from הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> from the people

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אָרְנָ֤ן <WH771> And Ornan אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> unto David קַֽח־ <WH3947> Take לָ֔ךְ וְיַ֛עַשׂ <WH6213> do אֲדֹנִ֥י <WH113> [it] to thee and let my lord הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king הַטּ֣וֹב <WH2896> [that which is] good בְּעֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> in his eyes רְאֵה֩ <WH7200> lo נָתַ֨תִּי <WH5414> I give הַבָּקָ֜ר <WH1241> [thee] the oxen לָֽעֹל֗וֹת <WH5930> [also] for burnt offerings וְהַמּוֹרִגִּ֧ים <WH4173> and the threshing instruments לָעֵצִ֛ים <WH6086> for wood וְהַחִטִּ֥ים <WH2406> and the wheat לַמִּנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> for the meat offering הַכֹּ֥ל <WH3605> all נָתָֽתִּי׃ <WH5414> I give

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> And king דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> David לְאָרְנָ֔ן <WH771> to Ornan לֹ֕א <WH3808> No כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for קָנֹ֥ה <WH7069> Nay but I will verily אֶקְנֶ֖ה <WH7069> buy בְּכֶ֣סֶף <WH3701> price מָלֵ֑א <WH4392> it for the full כִּ֠י <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> No אֶשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> for I will not take אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what לְךָ֙ לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> [that] which [is] thine for the LORD וְהַעֲל֥וֹת <WH5927> nor offer עוֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> burnt offerings חִנָּֽם׃ <WH2600> without cost

וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> gave דָּוִ֛יד <WH1732> So David לְאָרְנָ֖ן <WH771> to Ornan בַּמָּק֑וֹם <WH4725> for the place שִׁקְלֵ֣י <WH8255> shekels זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> of gold מִשְׁקָ֖ל <WH4948> by weight שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> six מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred

וַיִּבֶן֩ <WH1129> built שָׁ֨ם <WH8033> there דָּוִ֤יד <WH1732> And David מִזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> there an altar לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וַיַּ֥עַל <WH5927> and offered עֹל֖וֹת <WH5930> burnt offerings וּשְׁלָמִ֑ים <WH8002> and peace offerings וַיִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> and called אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> upon the LORD וַיַּֽעֲנֵ֤הוּ <WH6030> and he answered בָאֵשׁ֙ <WH784> by fire מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> him from heaven עַ֖ל <WH5921> on מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> upon the altar הָעֹלָֽה׃ <WH5930> of burnt offering פ
וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> commanded יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD לַמַּלְאָ֔ךְ <WH4397> the angel וַיָּ֥שֶׁב <WH7725> again חַרְבּ֖וֹ <WH2719> his sword אֶל־ <WH413> in נְדָנָֽהּ׃ <WH5084> into the sheath

בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> At that time הַהִ֔יא <WH1931> he בִּרְא֤וֹת <WH7200> saw דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> when David כִּי־ <WH3588> for עָנָ֣הוּ <WH6030> had answered יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> that the LORD בְּגֹ֖רֶן <WH1637> him in the threshingfloor אָרְנָ֣ן <WH771> of Ornan הַיְבוּסִ֑י <WH2983> the Jebusite וַיִּזְבַּ֖ח <WH2076> then he sacrificed שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וּמִשְׁכַּ֣ן <WH4908> For the tabernacle יְ֠הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשָׂ֨ה <WH6213> made מֹשֶׁ֧ה <WH4872> which Moses בַמִּדְבָּ֛ר <WH4057> in the wilderness וּמִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> and the altar הָעוֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> of the burnt offering בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> [were] at that season הַהִ֑יא <WH1931> he בַּבָּמָ֖ה <WH1116> in the high place בְּגִבְעֽוֹן׃ <WH1391> at Gibeon

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not יָכֹ֥ל <WH3201> could דָּוִ֛יד <WH1732> But David לָלֶ֥כֶת <WH1980> go לְפָנָ֖יו <WH6440> before לִדְרֹ֣שׁ <WH1875> it to enquire אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God כִּ֣י <WH3588> for נִבְעַ֔ת <WH1204> for he was afraid מִפְּנֵ֕י <WH6440> because חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> of the sword מַלְאַ֥ךְ <WH4397> of the angel יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD ס
